availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Goss Reasor. Father of William T. Reasor and Catharine L. Reasor. Louisville City Councilman and City Attorney.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 172-173. Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky, Roll 7007126: Louisville, Books 1-4, p. 291. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Jefferson County, 1862.
Henry Tanner, ed, Louisville Directory Business Advertiser for 1859-60. (Louisville, Maxwell & Co., 1859), p. 307.
